# activityCategory

**Type Property**

The category of the activity, which may be used to group activities in the UI.

## Declaration

```swift
class var activityCategory: UIActivity.Category { get }
```

## Return Value

The assigned category of the activity. The default implementation returns [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivity/Category/action].

## Discussion

Override this property to define a different activity category for your custom activity.

## Getting the activity information

- **UIActivity.Category**: An enumeration that defines categories of activities.
- **activityType**: The type of service being provided.
- **UIActivity.ActivityType**: A structure that describes the types of activities for which the system has built-in support.
- **activityTitle**: A user-readable string that describes the service.
- **activityImage**: An image that identifies the service to the user.
